string.value: Cassandra will be giving out a Special Alphabet Letter on Back To School day! The Cassandra is only giving it out on that one day, so you'd better go get it now!
Cassandra is apparently giving out one letter you ask for.
You received a Special Alphabet letter on Back To School day as part of MapleStory's Surprise Back To School event.

You know that energetic and anxious feeling you get every September... Like, you're ready to tackle the world of academia?! To commemorate such an exciting time of the year, I'd like to give you a special gift! Whad'dya say?
Wha... what? You don't want my gift? But it is a letter that you desperately need! It's just one letter so... what's the big deal?
